elements.name: Frage 2
elements.title: Which four languages do most of our foreign words come from?

elements.name: question1
elements.title: Why does the term "foreign word" no longer apply to many terms?
elements.correctAnswer: Some words are very familiar to us; we no longer perceive them as foreign.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: Foreign words can be used if they are generally known and if they fit the text. Under which two other conditions should foreign words also be used?
elements.correctAnswer: When they describe something better than the German word. When the German word is cumbersome or outdated.

elements.name: question5
elements.title: What are Helvetisms? Give an example.
elements.correctAnswer: Words that are only used in Swiss German. Example: Velo, standard German: Fahrrad

elements.name: question3
elements.title: What are the four levels of style?
